## Lite.(constructor)

Create a client for interacting with a WebAssembly Cerbos policy bundle.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(source: Source, options?: Options);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | [Source](./lite.source.md) | WebAssembly binary code of a policy bundle (or an HTTP response from which to stream it). |
|  options | [Options](./lite.options.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> additional client settings. |

## Example 1

Fetch a policy bundle via HTTP in a [supported browser](https://caniuse.com/wasm) or Node.js 18.1+:

```typescript
const cerbos = new Lite(fetch("/policies.wasm"));
```

## Example 2

Read a policy bundle from disk in Node.js:

```typescript
const cerbos = new Lite(fs.readFileSync("policies.wasm"));
```
